column4: Hey, I jsut got a Linksys WUSB54G Ver. 4 Wireless G USB 2.0 which works straight out of the box, but what am i supposed to type in the terminal to get it to work?
I thought it works straight out the box?
Well, obviously its not like I hook it up and it works, I need to enter a wep key and stuff, isn't there a command and stuff?
You can do it from System > Administration > Networking ... not sure about a command
